Directions: In a large saucepan, saute onion and celery in butter until tender. Stir in flour and salt until blended. Gradually add milk. Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened and bubbly. Reduce heat. Add potatoes, parsley and paprika; heat through.
Ingredients: 3 medium potatoes - peeled, cooked and sliced
